name: Elav
overview: Elav is a Commodore 64 game developed by Ice Team in collaboration with Ready64 forum and released in 2006 for the Minigame Competition where it reached the 3° position. This was created to be something of a Rampage clone with only 4KB of space (using music too), so with a space that is less than a 1/10 of normal C64 game. You have 10 levels to clean from the buildings.
